name: Never Let Go
content: Last time that I went away
Left those sun kissed summer days
离开那些沐浴在阳光下的夏日
You told me our love won't fade
你告诉我我们的爱不会褪色
No matter how long I stayed
You are my you are my lullaby
在我身边我们安然无恙
'Cause you are my you are my
Slowly and the stars will follow
Hold me and I'll never let go
'Cause you are my you are my
Only place that my heart beats slowly
唯一一个我心跳缓慢的地方
Hold me and I'll never let go
Lost in all those steady dreams
迷失在那些坚定的梦想里
不知道什么对我有好处
You told me that I will see
All of this was meant to be
You are my you are my lullaby
在我身边我们安然无恙
'Cause you are my you are my
Slowly and the stars will follow
Hold me and I'll never let go
'Cause you are my you are my
Only place that my heart beats slowly
唯一一个我心跳缓慢的地方
Hold me and I'll never let go
Your party has hung up Sir
